attachments.title: Creating a Party
attachments.text: `/slotbot create party [slots] [time] [date]` Creates a new party with the specified parameters.

attachments.title: Viewing Parties
attachments.text:
`/slotbot show parties` Shows all the parties happening in the near future.
*Note:* This will only show parties for the current game channel.

attachments.title: Joining/Leaving Parties
attachments.text: `/slotbot (join|leave) party [party_number]` This allows you to join or leave a party with the specified number. Party numbers can be seen by using the 'show parties' command.

fields.title: [party_number]
fields.value: The number of the party you want to join or leave.
